entry.title: SPECIAL AIR QUALITY STATEMENT, Prince George
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 8:45 p.m. PDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Clear, 0.0Â°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Prince George Airport 9:00 PM PDT Thursday 30 March 2023
Condition: Clear
Temperature: 0.0°C
Pressure: 100.3 kPa
Visibility: 16 km
Humidity: 64 %
Dewpoint: -5.9°C

Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Thursday night: Periods of snow. Low minus 2.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness near midnight then periods of snow beginning before morning. Low minus 2. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow or rain. High plus 5.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending near noon then cloudy with 30 percent chance of rain showers or wet flurries. Snowfall amount 2 cm. Wind becoming south 30 km/h gusting to 50 near noon. High plus 5. UV index 2 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low minus 1. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of rain showers or wet flurries early in the evening. 60 percent chance of flurries overnight. Wind south 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light late in the evening. Low minus 1. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Thursday 30 March 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High plus 5. POP 60%
entry.summary: A mix of sun and cloud with 60 percent chance of flurries. High plus 5. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PDT Thursday 30 March 2023
